trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the tracking of activity start and stop events.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: By default, activity starts and stops must be property nested.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
That is, a sequence of Start A, Start B, Stop A, Stop B is not allowed will result in B stopping at the same time as A.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xx$ x xxxxxxxx xx Xxxxx X$ Xxxxx X$ Xxxx X$ Xxxx X xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx X xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xx X.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Use the default behavior for start and stop tracking.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: By default, an activity cannot be recursive.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: That is, a sequence of Start A, Start A, Stop A, Stop A is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xx$ x xxxxxxxx xx Xxxxx X$ Xxxxx X$ Xxxx X$ Xxxx X xx xxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: Unintentional recursive activities can occur if the app executes and for some the stop is not reached before another start is called.
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx.
